Package org.knime.core.webui.node.dialog.defaultdialog.widget.button

Interface ButtonUpdateHandler<R,S,M extends Enum<M>>

Type Parameters:
R - the type of the setting which is annotated by ButtonWidget
S - the settings which should trigger an update of the button (see DependencyHandler)
M - the state machine of the button. This has to be the same one as for the ButtonWidget.actionHandler()
All Superinterfaces:
DependencyHandler<S>, UpdateHandler<ButtonChange<R,M>,S>
All Known Implementing Classes:
CancelableActionHandler.UpdateHandler, NoopButtonUpdateHandler
public interface ButtonUpdateHandler<R,S,M extends Enum<M>> extends UpdateHandler<ButtonChange<R,M>,S>
A handler for updating the button state when another setting changes its value.
